: : DeathStar : :

DeathStar takes in the sight, also.

DeathStar: I love Cybertron, but I have to admit that these organic planets are stunning.

He begins to scan the Earth's surface.

DeathStar: Now it will just be a few nano clicks before I find the Tripredacus base.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
The small ship stops next to the other Tripred.

Clawstorm: Hehe... Slag you, Deathstar! You're lucky I had such a 
small engine! But I....

He stops as he sees the show right before him. Earth in all its 
majesty, and the Moon right around her.

Clawstorm: Whoa... What a sight!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : DeathStar : :
> 
> Back in time, over Earth, the rift ripples through space. DeathStar 
comes through it at high speed.
> 
> DeathStar: Haha, I still have it... Oh pit!
> 
> DeathStar is moveing to fast and is about to get trapped by Earth's 
gravity and enter the atmosphere on a lethal course. It takes every 
bit of power he has to pull up. Once he has, he cuts his engines and 
waits for Clawstorm.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Clawstorm: Here I go, pops!
> 
> He pushed on the thruster pedal and launched his ship in pursuit of 
> Deathstar. However, after just a few nanoclicks, it became evident 
> that the ship wasn't as fast as the bot. As he entered through the 
> rift, he tried to take a boost.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : DeathStar : :
> > 
> > DeathStar chuckles.
> > 
> > DeathStar: If you think you can keep up with this "old bot." 
First 
> one to Earth's atmosphere wins.
> > 
> > DeathStar punches his thrusters taking him into the transwarp 
rift.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Clawstorm: Arright! That'll be some funtime! *Howllllllllllllll*
> > 
> > He thrust his ship faster and farther, coming up just next to 
> > Deathstar.
> > 
> > Clawstorm: Wanna race?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : DeathStar : :
> > > 
> > > DeathStar: That's correct. We'll meet up with Major Tyrael's 
> forces 
> > on Earth.
> > > 
> > > DeathStar continues his flight towards prehistoric Earth.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > In a little one-manned ship, another Tripredacus followed.
> > > 
> > > ????: Hey Deathstar, ya leaving without me? That ain't fair! I 
> > wanna 
> > > crush 'em too!
> > > 
> > > He was unmistakably techno-organic, but somehow, there was 
> > something 
> > > strange to him. Since he wasn't a flyer, he had to take a ship, 
> but 
> > > he didn't care. The promise of action was far too appealing.
> > > 
> > > He was Clawstorm, the werewolf.
> > > 
> > > Clawstorm: Hey, we going to meet the major, right? That is 
where 
> he 
> > > is, on Earth?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Assassin" <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > OOC: Man, where is everyone? Have you all dropped off the 
edge 
> of 
> > > > Cybertron?
> > > > 
> > > > IC: : : Darkangel/DeathStar : :
> > > > 
> > > > Darkangel was waiting for a reply from Tripredacus command 
when 
> > his 
> > > > optics move to Dreadplague. Was there something there? He was 
> > > > studying her when he heard a voice comm over subspace.
> > > > 
> > > > Tripredacus Command, Cybertron: We have recieved your request 
> > agent 
> > > > Drakangel. We are currently scrambling support troops. Your 
> > > personal 
> > > > request has already been met. Air Commander DeathStar is 
> leaving 
> > as 
> > > > we speak. Tripredacus Command, over and out.
> > > > 
> > > > On the surface of Cybertron a rather large group of 
Tripredacus 
> > > > flyers is assembled. Addressing the group is a large black 
bot, 
> > who 
> > > > looks to have an alt mode of a star fighter.
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar: ... With that, I will be leaving you. General 
Arnot 
> > will 
> > > > take over. I will be going to Earth to deal with our friends 
> > > problems 
> > > > in these... Beast Wars. I bid you farewell my troops. Vehical 
> > mode!
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar transformes to his star fighter mode and blasts off 
> > > towards 
> > > > the transwarp rift, leaving Cybertron behind.
> > > > 
> > > > Back on Cybertron, General Arnot has started to speak, when 
> > > suddenly, 
> > > > an explosion shakes the area, terminating him. The flyers 
> > scramble.
> > > > 
> > > > Random Tripred Flyer #1: What in the name of Primus is going 
on?
> > > > 
> > > > Random Tripred Flyer #2: It's an attack! Must be the n....
> > > > 
> > > > Before the transformer can finish his sentence he is crushed 
as 
> a 
> > > > black and silver Earth semi-truck drives over him. Soon 
after, 
> a 
> > > > black and yellow Earth jet fires it's weapons, clearing the 
> area, 
> > > > before landing next to the truck. The attacking vehicals 
> > transform 
> > > to 
> > > > their robot modes.
> > > > 
> > > > Diesel: So much for the recon mission, eh, Razor?
> > > > 
> > > > Razor: Yeah, but it was more fun to blow them too bits, 
Diesel.
> > > > 
> > > > A clicking of weapons being primed, attracts Razor and 
Diesel's 
> > > > attention again.
> > > > 
> > > > Random Tripred Flyer #3: Not all of us...
> > > > 
> > > > Razor draws his plasma rifle from subspace as Diesel ignites 
> his 
> > > > laser rod sword.
> > > > 
> > > > Razor: Diesel, old buddy, I think you may want to contact the 
> > rest 
> > > of 
> > > > the nWo...
> > > > 
> > > > OOC: I just thought that showing the nWo doing what I had 
them 
> > > leave 
> > > > Earth for, fighting the Tripredacus, would be cool. I'm not 
> > > > reclaiming those chars or restarting the nWo.
> > >

<P><STRONG>DeathStar: </STRONG>Now it will just be a few nano clicks before I find the Tripredacus base.</P>
